ComicInfo.Summary:
Have I Got a Ghoul for You: Gertrude schemes for riches in hopes of flaunting them in the face of Ormond Mitchell.
Home to Your Grave: Korman escapes from America and his crimes by being hidden in a coffin that is being shipped to Europe.
Bound Man's Bluff: A thief tries to steal the valuables of a performer.
The Curse of Ozzie and Mary: Ozzie hires Vargas to turn his co-star into a rat.
The Dancing Dead: A corrupt Indian agent kills his wife when she discovers that he has been cheating the Indians on his reservation.
Moonlight and Laughter: A werewolf hunter tries to become normal but when a pack of werewolves kidnap his fiance his is forced to fight them.
ComicInfo.Tags: Werewolves,Abel,Madame Xanadu,The House of Secrets,Greenwich Village
